title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 21 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 21 2022
description:
Countdown to the "I'm so grateful for the vaccine and 2 boosters" genuflection in 3…2…1: Vaccinated and boosted, President Biden tests positive for covid. Biden just didn’t mask up hard enough. Probably let his guard down. He needs to take the virus more seriously. Former WH Press Secretary Kayleigh McEnany: Biden White House has a messaging problem and a facts problem. GOP should pledge to overturn Democrat covid rules, if they win control of Congress. Buck says, "The Democrat Party deserves the biggest ass-kicking in its history -- based on its covid wrongness alone." Clay's concern: "I just hope that the covid shot isn't actually going to end up making covid far worse than it would have been if we had never had a covid shot at all." Biden says he has cancer, but the White House says he’s wrong.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
